e15-co543-Swarm-Robot-Monitoring-System-.title: Swarm Robot Monitoring System group A
e15-co543-Swarm-Robot-Monitoring-System-.description: A swarm robotics systems consists of automation robots with local sensing and communication capabilities, lacking centralized control or access to global information, situated in a possibly unknown environment performing a collective action. Therefore, having centralized monitoring in addition to the distributed local sensing yields to a more robust system as a centralized monitoring system capable of performing global collective actions under a wide range of group sizes (scalability), despite the possible sudden loss of multiple agents (robustness), and under unknown and dynamic circumstances (flexibility).

e15-co543-Swarm-Robot-Monitoring-System-.title: Swarm Robot Monitoring System group B
e15-co543-Swarm-Robot-Monitoring-System-.description: localization of robots, identifying  the boundary of arena and distance calculation with image processing(openCV python)

e15-co543-Swarm-Robot-Monitoring-System-.title: Swarm Robot Monitoring System group C
e15-co543-Swarm-Robot-Monitoring-System-.description: Localization of multiple robots in real time, Video restoration at the presence of noise due to lighting conditions and degradation due to motion blur.
